oracle.spatial.geometry

Class LRSGeometryG3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.geometry.LRSGeometryG3D

  • public class LRSGeometryG3D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines an LRS Geodetic 3D geometry object
